prompt_text: Editorial-style illustration of a neat terrarium checklist laid out on a table: a notepad with small sketches of a gecko, lamp, plant, and food dish, plus a pencil beside it. Warm light beige background, soft moss-green details, clean and friendly look.

Soft, welcoming illustration showing a person gently looking at a gecko in a terrarium for the first time. Simple interior background, warm lighting, natural tones, evokes curiosity and beginner friendliness.

Friendly educational illustration of a healthy gecko and a faint silhouette of an unwell gecko side by side, showing the difference in posture or color. Soft tones, muted turquoise highlights, calm and clear composition.

Vibrant yet natural illustration of several geckos native to Madagascar on branches with tropical leaves. Include a bright green day gecko, a leaf-tailed gecko, and background hints of island flora. Balanced matte texture, soft daylight.

Playful yet informative illustration showing a gecko observing a terrarium setup with comical small red ‘mistake’ icons (too small tank, missing lamp, etc.) in subtle symbolic form. Warm colors, friendly tone, matte paper look.

Soft editorial illustration of a small bowl filled with crickets and mealworms beside a jar of calcium powder, with a gecko tail visible in the background. Natural beige tones, matte lighting, educational and clean.

Editorial portrait-style illustration showing a cozy desk with a terrarium, books, and a notebook open with gecko sketches — representing an experienced hobbyist. Warm light, calm composition, natural color palette.

Dynamic editorial illustration depicting a scientist or explorer discovering a new gecko species in lush Vietnamese mountain scenery. A gecko on a mossy rock, soft fog, subtle excitement through light. Natural muted greens and browns.
